text:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8
 
Known issue Because of an issue in the error code handling routine, you might
receive the following error message instead of the expected error message when
there is insufficient disk space: 
* 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE 
--
%40c3878efa.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Ftopic%2Fkb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C56a74bdcc8534c9ff65208dc115d5b69%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638404339862012848%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=j2cZ2Svj8Y4A9%2B8QRfgBqms18YQeJBduY0As%2FJ%2BvsQo%3D&reserved=0] 
Known issue Because of an issue in the error code handling routine, you might
receive the following error message instead of the expected error message when
there is insufficient disk space: 
* 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE 
--
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/em61f9744d-143b-4f7d-998b-ae4284ecbbc7%40c3878efa.com
